data.message: Hey em my name is Jonathan lomeli 22 years old from cudahy California...I been trying to get in contact with you for a long time...I wanna be signed with your label...theres one particular reason...growin up your music inspired me to be a rapper..lol yeah know you heard that one before...im like the only rapper in my city the way I see it...nobody really got a interest in hiphop like I do..in the beginning of this year I would write to you consistently...I would send you links of my freestyles and never got a response..I gave up hope and stopped doing so..but something tells me one day you will respond..I live in poverty..yeah who wants to hear that sob story...lol I was raised by my grandmother...I basically had to learn how to be a man on my own...throughout my whole existence though music always helped me cope with the negativity...especially your songs...I dealt with alot of racism too growin up in my life..im a puertorican who lives in a mexican neighborhood..lol always had a problem for that reason...I heard I had to battle you to be signed with your label...alotta people hate me for doing so but idgf...hahaha...I dont really care for the money..I just wanna make music..these links im a send you are freestyles...if you gave me a shot and placed me In a studio you wont be disappointed..usually I could have some verses written down then freestyle the hook..I reached that level...my email is lomelijonathan4@gmail.com...if I was signed to shady I wont let u down..anybody who wants problems could get it..im loyal to those who help me..I remember  bein 9 years old hearin my name is when you released that track..as I got older im like damn this guy paints a perfect picture...I know alotta people gonna talk shit about things they dont understand but im ready for that...like I told you I live in cudahy California...if you ever curious..I live in a a trailer park..theres a black electrical fence infront of it..I live between a used to be abandoned liquor store and taco bell...the adress is 7520 atlantic ave sp#1... I live in the green trailer..I kno its a longshot but im trying to get in contact with you..the other day you said you would talk to people only about the film south paw...I asked a question and never got a response from you...in addition I also sended my freestyle links from youtube...I heard I had to battle you to get a shot...I saw it as a opportunity to talk with you but it never happened...hopefully you read this...im a send you those links now...I atleast wanna hear what you thibk about my work..anybody could push a like or dislike button..but as somebody who got the rep that you have maybe you could shed some clarity on what you think... https://youtu.be/kxSDEqbc-4Q https://youtu.be/8TC5WfgwbFI https://youtu.be/7yehieEuKlc https://youtu.be/YUQPHltAUzo https://youtu.be/7y2sBHcAiOQ https://youtu.be/XxTfxkeqWgc https://youtu.be/JIbR7i2QXs4 https://youtu.be/tBhS335fLtU https://youtu.be/IL_oP7vIlz8 https://youtu.be/3EJJ1ME_GX8 https://youtu.be/1J1VzEAyn94 some of these links are me battleing you and some are just freestyles.. get at me peace

replies.message:
Nice bro!!!!

Sign this petition for Eminem to come back to the UK for another tour and he can notice you, you just need to sign and get other people on board!!!! 

Sign and share!!!
